Package dominio

Class Board

java.lang.Object
dominio.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AcceleratedBoard, SlowBoard
public abstract class Board extends Object implements Serializable
Clase abstracta en la que se maneja la logica general de un tablero de Tetris
